Name: CVE-2021-45812
Description: NUUO Network Video Recorder NVRsolo 3.9.1 is affected by a Cross Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability. An attacker can steal the user's session by injecting malicious JavaScript codes which leads to session hijacking.

Name: CVE-2021-45813
Description: SLICAN WebCTI 1.01 2015 is affected by a Cross Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability. The attacker can steal the user's session by injecting malicious JavaScript codes which leads to Session Hijacking and cause user's credentials theft.

Name: CVE-2021-45814
Description: Nettmp NNT 5.1 is affected by a SQL injection vulnerability. An attacker can bypass authentication and access the panel with an administrative account.

Name: CVE-2021-45815
Description: Quectel UC20 UMTS/HSPA+ UC20 6.3.14 is affected by a Cross Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability.

Name: CVE-2021-45816
Description: ** RESERVED ** This candidate has been reserved by an organization or individual that will use it when announcing a new security problem. When the candidate has been publicized, the details for this candidate will be provided.

Notes: All CVE users should reference CVE-2018-11689 instead of this candidate. All references and descriptions in this candidate have been removed to prevent accidental usage.

Name: CVE-2021-45818
Description: SAFARI Montage 8.7.32 is affected by a CRLF injection vulnerability which can lead to HTTP response splitting.

Name: CVE-2021-45819
Description: Wordline HIDCCEMonitorSVC before v5.2.4.3 contains an unquoted service path which allows attackers to escalate privileges to the system level.

Name: CVE-2021-45820
Description: ** RESERVED ** This candidate has been reserved by an organization or individual that will use it when announcing a new security problem. When the candidate has been publicized, the details for this candidate will be provided.

Name: CVE-2021-45821
Description: A blind SQL injection vulnerability exists in Xbtit 3.1 via the sid parameter in ajaxchat/getHistoryChatData.php file that is accessible by a registered user. As a result, a malicious user can extract sensitive data such as usernames and passwords and in some cases use this vulnerability in order to get a remote code execution on the remote web server.

Name: CVE-2021-45822
Description: A cross-site scripting vulnerability is present in Xbtit 3.1. The stored XSS vulnerability occurs because /ajaxchat/sendChatData.php does not properly validate the value of the "n" (POST) parameter. Through this vulnerability, an attacker is capable to execute malicious JavaScript code.

Description: ** RESERVED ** This candidate has been reserved by an organization or individual that will use it when announcing a new security problem. When the candidate has been publicized, the details for this candidate will be provided.

Name: CVE-2021-45829
Description: HDF5 1.13.1-1 is affected by: segmentation fault, which causes a Denial of Service.

Name: CVE-2021-45830
Description: A heap-based buffer overflow vulnerability exists in HDF5 1.13.1-1 via H5F_addr_decode_len in /hdf5/src/H5Fint.c, which could cause a Denial of Service.

Name: CVE-2021-45831
Description: A Null Pointer Dereference vulnerability exitgs in GPAC 1.0.1 in MP4Box via __strlen_avx2, which causes a Denial of Service.

Name: CVE-2021-45832
Description: A Stack-based Buffer Overflow Vulnerability exists in HDF5 1.13.1-1 at at hdf5/src/H5Eint.c, which causes a Denial of Service (context-dependent).

Name: CVE-2021-45833
Description: A Stack-based Buffer Overflow Vulnerability exists in HDF5 1.13.1-1 via the H5D__create_chunk_file_map_hyper function in /hdf5/src/H5Dchunk.c, which causes a Denial of Service (context-dependent).

Name: CVE-2021-45834
Description: An attacker can upload or transfer files of dangerous types to the OpenDocMan 1.4.4 portal via add.php using MIME-bypass, which may be automatically processed within the product's environment or lead to arbitrary code execution.

Name: CVE-2021-45835
Description: The Online Admission System 1.0 allows an unauthenticated attacker to upload or transfer files of dangerous types to the application through documents.php, which may be used to execute malicious code or lead to code execution.

Name: CVE-2021-45836
Description: An authenticated attacker can execute arbitrary commands as root in Terramaster F4-210, F2-210 TOS 4.2.X (4.2.15-2107141517) by injecting a maliciously crafted input in the request through /tos/index.php?app/hand_app.

Name: CVE-2021-45837
Description: It is possible to execute arbitrary commands as root in Terramaster F4-210, F2-210 TOS 4.2.X (4.2.15-2107141517) by sending a specifically crafted input to /tos/index.php?app/del.

Name: CVE-2021-45838
Description: ** RESERVED ** This candidate has been reserved by an organization or individual that will use it when announcing a new security problem. When the candidate has been publicized, the details for this candidate will be provided.

Name: CVE-2021-45839
Description: It is possible to obtain the first administrator's hash set up on the system in Terramaster F4-210, F2-210 TOS 4.2.X (4.2.15-2107141517) as well as other information such as MAC address, internal IP address etc. by performing a request to the /module/api.php?mobile/webNasIPS endpoint.

Name: CVE-2021-45840
Description: It is possible to execute arbitrary commands as root in Terramaster F4-210, F2-210 TOS 4.2.X (4.2.15-2107141517) by sending specifically crafted input to /tos/index.php?app/app_start_stop.

Name: CVE-2021-45841
Description: In Terramaster F4-210, F2-210 TOS 4.2.X (4.2.15-2107141517), an attacker can self-sign session cookies by knowing the target's MAC address and the user's password hash. Guest users (disabled by default) can be abused using a null/empty hash and allow an unauthenticated attacker to login as guest.

Name: CVE-2021-45842
Description: It is possible to obtain the first administrator's hash set up in Terramaster F4-210, F2-210 TOS 4.2.X (4.2.15-2107141517) on the system as well as other information such as MAC address, internal IP address etc. by performing a request to the /module/api.php?mobile/wapNasIPS endpoint.

Name: CVE-2021-45843
Description: glFusion CMS v1.7.9 is affected by a reflected Cross Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability. The value of the title request parameter is copied into the value of an HTML tag attribute which is encapsulated in double quotation marks. This input was echoed unmodified in the application's response.

Name: CVE-2021-45844
Description: Improper sanitization in the invocation of ODA File Converter from FreeCAD 0.19 allows an attacker to inject OS commands via a crafted filename.
References: DEBIAN:DSA-5229   |   URL:https://www.debian.org/security/2022/dsa-5229   |   MISC:https://forum.freecadweb.org/viewtopic.php?t=64733   |   MISC:https://tracker.freecad.org/view.php?id=4809   |   MLIST:[debian-lts-announce] 20220307 [SECURITY] [DLA 2934-1] freecad security update   |   URL:https://lists.debian.org/debian-lts-announce/2022/03/msg00004.html   |   MLIST:[debian-lts-announce] 20220818 [SECURITY] [DLA 3076-1] freecad security update   |   URL:https://lists.debian.org/debian-lts-announce/2022/08/msg00008.html

Name: CVE-2021-45845
Description: The Path Sanity Check script of FreeCAD 0.19 is vulnerable to OS command injection, allowing an attacker to execute arbitrary commands via a crafted FCStd document.

Name: CVE-2021-45846
Description: A flaw in the AMF parser of Slic3r libslic3r 1.3.0 allows an attacker to cause an application crash using a crafted AMF document, where a metadata tag lacks a "type" attribute.

Name: CVE-2021-45847
Description: Several missing input validations in the 3MF parser component of Slic3r libslic3r 1.3.0 can each allow an attacker to cause an application crash using a crafted 3MF input file.

Name: CVE-2021-45848
Description: Denial of service (DoS) vulnerability in Nicotine+ 3.0.3 and later allows a user with a modified Soulseek client to crash Nicotine+ by sending a file download request with a file path containing a null character.

Description: tsMuxer git-c6a0277 was discovered to contain a segmentation fault via DTSStreamReader::findFrame in dtsStreamReader.cpp.

Description: A File Upload vulnerability exists in Sourcecodester Student Attendance Manageent System 1.0 via the file upload functionality.

Name: CVE-2021-45876
Description: Multiple versions of GARO Wallbox GLB/GTB/GTC are affected by unauthenticated command injection. The url parameter of the function module downloadAndUpdate is vulnerable to an command Injection. Unfiltered user input is used to generate code which then gets executed when downloading new firmware.

Name: CVE-2021-45877
Description: Multiple versions of GARO Wallbox GLB/GTB/GTC are affected by hard coded credentials. A hardcoded credential exist in /etc/tomcat8/tomcat-user.xml, which allows attackers to gain authorized access and control the tomcat completely on port 8000 in the tomcat manger page.

Name: CVE-2021-45878
Description: Multiple versions of GARO Wallbox GLB/GTB/GTC are affected by incorrect access control. Lack of access control on the web manger pages allows any user to view and modify information.

Name: CVE-2021-45884
Description: In Brave Desktop 1.17 through 1.33 before 1.33.106, when CNAME-based adblocking and a proxying extension with a SOCKS fallback are enabled, additional DNS requests are issued outside of the proxying extension using the system's DNS settings, resulting in information disclosure. NOTE: this issue exists because of an incomplete fix for CVE-2021-21323 and CVE-2021-22916.

Name: CVE-2021-45885
Description: An issue was discovered in Stormshield Network Security (SNS) 4.2.2 through 4.2.7 (fixed in 4.2.8). Under a specific update-migration scenario, the first SSH password change does not properly clear the old password.

Name: CVE-2021-45886
Description: An issue was discovered in PONTON X/P Messenger before 3.11.2. Anti-CSRF tokens are globally valid, making the web application vulnerable to a weakened version of CSRF, where an arbitrary token of a low-privileged user (such as operator) can be used to confirm actions of higher-privileged ones (such as xpadmin).

Name: CVE-2021-45887
Description: An issue was discovered in PONTON X/P Messenger before 3.11.2. Due to path traversal in private/SchemaSetUpload.do for uploaded ZIP files, an executable script can be uploaded by web application administrators, giving the attacker remote code execution on the underlying server via an imgs/*.jsp URI.

Name: CVE-2021-45888
Description: An issue was discovered in PONTON X/P Messenger before 3.11.2. The navigation tree that is shown on the left side of every page of the web application is vulnerable to XSS: it allows injection of JavaScript into its nodes. Creating such nodes is only possible for users who have the role Configuration Administrator or Administrator.

Name: CVE-2021-45889
Description: An issue was discovered in PONTON X/P Messenger before 3.11.2. Several functions are vulnerable to reflected XSS, as demonstrated by private/index.jsp?partners/ShowNonLocalPartners.do?localID= or private/index.jsp or private/index.jsp?database/databaseTab.jsp or private/index.jsp?activation/activationMainTab.jsp or private/index.jsp?communication/serverTab.jsp or private/index.jsp?emailNotification/notificationTab.jsp.

Name: CVE-2021-45890
Description: basic/BasicAuthProvider.java in AuthGuard before 0.9.0 allows authentication via an inactive identifier.

Name: CVE-2021-45891
Description: An issue was discovered in Softwarebuero Zauner ARC 4.2.0.4., that allows attackers to escalate privileges within the application, since all permission checks are done client-side, not server-side.

Name: CVE-2021-45892
Description: An issue was discovered in Softwarebuero Zauner ARC 4.2.0.4. There is storage of Passwords in a Recoverable Format.

Name: CVE-2021-45893
Description: An issue was discovered in Softwarebuero Zauner ARC 4.2.0.4. There is Improper Handling of Case Sensitivity, which makes password guessing easier.

Name: CVE-2021-45894
Description: An issue was discovered in Softwarebuero Zauner ARC 4.2.0.4. There is Cleartext Transmission of Sensitive Information.

Name: CVE-2021-45895
Description: Netgen Tags Bundle 3.4.x before 3.4.11 and 4.0.x before 4.0.15 allows XSS in the Tags Admin interface.

Name: CVE-2021-45896
Description: Nokia FastMile 3TG00118ABAD52 devices allow privilege escalation by an authenticated user via is_ctc_admin=1 to login_web_app.cgi and use of Import Config File.

Name: CVE-2021-45897
Description: SuiteCRM before 7.12.3 and 8.x before 8.0.2 allows remote code execution.

Name: CVE-2021-45898
Description: SuiteCRM before 7.12.3 and 8.x before 8.0.2 allows local file inclusion.

Name: CVE-2021-45899
Description: SuiteCRM before 7.12.3 and 8.x before 8.0.2 allows PHAR deserialization that can lead to remote code execution.

Name: CVE-2021-45900
Description: Vivoh Webinar Manager before 3.6.3.0 has improper API authentication. When a user logs in to the administration configuration web portlet, a VIVOH_AUTH cookie is assigned so that they can be uniquely identified. Certain APIs can be successfully executed without proper authentication. This can let an attacker impersonate as victim and make state changing requests on their behalf.

Name: CVE-2021-45901
Description: The password-reset form in ServiceNow Orlando provides different responses to invalid authentication attempts depending on whether the username exists.

Name: CVE-2021-45902
Description: ** RESERVED ** This candidate has been reserved by an organization or individual that will use it when announcing a new security problem. When the candidate has been publicized, the details for this candidate will be provided.

Name: CVE-2021-45903
Description: A persistent cross-site scripting (XSS) issue in the web interface of SuiteCRM before 7.10.35, and 7.11.x and 7.12.x before 7.12.2, allows a remote attacker to introduce arbitrary JavaScript via attachments upload, a different vulnerability than CVE-2021-39267 and CVE-2021-39268.

Name: CVE-2021-45904
Description: OpenWrt 21.02.1 allows XSS via the Port Forwards Add Name screen.

Name: CVE-2021-45905
Description: OpenWrt 21.02.1 allows XSS via the Traffic Rules Name screen.

Name: CVE-2021-45906
Description: OpenWrt 21.02.1 allows XSS via the NAT Rules Name screen.

Name: CVE-2021-45907
Description: An issue was discovered in gif2apng 1.9. There is a stack-based buffer overflow involving a for loop. An attacker has little influence over the data written to the stack, making it unlikely that the flow of control can be subverted.

Name: CVE-2021-45908
Description: An issue was discovered in gif2apng 1.9. There is a stack-based buffer overflow involving a while loop. An attacker has little influence over the data written to the stack, making it unlikely that the flow of control can be subverted.

Name: CVE-2021-45909
Description: An issue was discovered in gif2apng 1.9. There is a heap-based buffer overflow vulnerability in the DecodeLZW function. It allows an attacker to write a large amount of arbitrary data outside the boundaries of a buffer.

Name: CVE-2021-45910
Description: An issue was discovered in gif2apng 1.9. There is a heap-based buffer overflow within the main function. It allows an attacker to write data outside of the allocated buffer. The attacker has control over a part of the address that data is written to, control over the written data, and (to some extent) control over the amount of data that is written.

Name: CVE-2021-45911
Description: An issue was discovered in gif2apng 1.9. There is a heap-based buffer overflow in the main function. It allows an attacker to write 2 bytes outside the boundaries of the buffer.

Name: CVE-2021-45912
Description: An unauthenticated Named Pipe channel in Controlup Real-Time Agent (cuAgent.exe) before 8.5 potentially allows an attacker to run OS commands via the ProcessActionRequest WCF method.

Name: CVE-2021-45913
Description: A hardcoded key in ControlUp Real-Time Agent (cuAgent.exe) before 8.2.5 may allow a potential attacker to run OS commands via a WCF channel.

Name: CVE-2021-45914
Description: In LuxSoft LuxCal Web Calendar before 5.2.0, an unauthenticated attacker can manipulate a POST request. This allows the attacker's session to be authenticated as any registered LuxCal user, including the site administrator.

Name: CVE-2021-45915
Description: In LuxSoft LuxCal Web Calendar before 5.2.0, an unauthenticated attacker can manipulate a cookie value. This allows the attacker's session to be authenticated as any registered LuxCal user, including the site administrator.

Name: CVE-2021-45916
Description: The programming function of Shockwall system has an improper input validation vulnerability. An authenticated attacker within the local area network can send malicious response to the server to disrupt the service partially.

Name: CVE-2021-45917
Description: The server-request receiver function of Shockwall system has an improper authentication vulnerability. An authenticated attacker of an agent computer within the local area network can use the local registry information to launch server-side request forgery (SSRF) attack on another agent computer, resulting in arbitrary code execution for controlling the system or disrupting service.

Name: CVE-2021-45918
Description: NHI’s health insurance web service component has insufficient validation for input string length, which can result in heap-based buffer overflow attack. A remote attacker can exploit this vulnerability to flood the memory space reserved for the program, in order to terminate service without authentication, which requires a system restart to recover service.

Name: CVE-2021-45919
Description: Studio 42 elFinder through 2.1.31 allows XSS via an SVG document.

Name: CVE-2021-45925
Description: Observable discrepancies in the login process allow an attacker to guess legitimate user names registered in the BMC. This issue affects: Lanner Inc IAC-AST2500A standard firmware version 1.10.0.

Name: CVE-2021-45926
Description: MDB Tools (aka mdbtools) 0.9.2 has a stack-based buffer overflow (at 0x7ffd0c689be0) in mdb_numeric_to_string (called from mdb_xfer_bound_data and _mdb_attempt_bind).

Name: CVE-2021-45927
Description: MDB Tools (aka mdbtools) 0.9.2 has a stack-based buffer overflow (at 0x7ffd6e029ee0) in mdb_numeric_to_string (called from mdb_xfer_bound_data and _mdb_attempt_bind).

Name: CVE-2021-45928
Description: libjxl b02d6b9, as used in libvips 8.11 through 8.11.2 and other products, has an out-of-bounds write in jxl::ModularFrameDecoder::DecodeGroup (called from jxl::FrameDecoder::ProcessACGroup and jxl::ThreadPool::RunCallState<jxl::FrameDecoder::ProcessSections).

Name: CVE-2021-45929
Description: Wasm3 0.5.0 has an out-of-bounds write in CompileBlock (called from CompileElseBlock and Compile_If).

Name: CVE-2021-45930
Description: Qt SVG in Qt 5.0.0 through 5.15.2 and 6.0.0 through 6.2.1 has an out-of-bounds write in QtPrivate::QCommonArrayOps<QPainterPath::Element>::growAppend (called from QPainterPath::addPath and QPathClipper::intersect).
